text: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَٱخۡتُلِفَ فِيهِۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهُ مُرِيبٖ

translation.en: And We had already given Moses the Scripture, but it came under disagreement. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed they are, concerning the Qur'an, in disquieting doubt
translation.id: Dan sungguh, telah Kami berikan kepada Musa Kitab (Taurat) lalu diperselisihkan. Sekiranya tidak ada keputusan yang terdahulu dari Tuhanmu, orang-orang kafir itu pasti sudah dibinasakan. Dan sesungguhnya mereka benar-benar dalam keraguan yang mendalam terhadapnya
